column1: 1269963685725908993 2020-06-08 12:05:12 UTC <BBCWorld> New Zealand has seen 1

column2: schools and workplaces will open  Weddings

column1: 1269963412035043329 2020-06-08 12:04:06 UTC <BBCWorld> The country moved to level one
column2: the lowest of its four-tier alert system
column4: at midnight local time (12:00 GMT)  The move is ahead of plan - it was brought forward after no new cases were reported for 17 days

column1: 1269963135353569281 2020-06-08 12:03:00 UTC <BBCWorld> Social distancing is no longer required (but is still recommended) and there are no longer any limits on public gatherings  But
